thread.title: Excellent stay at the Sheraton Kampala Hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent stay at the Sheraton Kampala Hotel - Review of Sheraton Kampala Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Fmbaziira
title: Excellent stay at the Sheraton Kampala Hotel
text: I truly enjoyed my stay at the Sheraton Kampala Hotel. Right from reservation, I was greatly assisted by Josephine Nanjonga and Phiona. At the reception. In the club lounge, Joy Tamale was very hospitable to us and our club guests.
